data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kefalas, Efthimios, Castritsi-Catharios, Jeanne (2012): A new species of Halichondriidae, Topsentia vaceleti n. sp. (Halichondrida, Demospongiae, Porifera), collected from coralligenous bottoms of the Aegean Sea. Zootaxa 3314: 58-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281100
